mapper.select: SELECT orderlist.order_id, client.client_nickname, orderlist.platform, orderlist.type_id, orderlist.order_status, orderlist.urgent, orderlist.total_price, orderlist.deadline_time, orderlist.create_time FROM od_order AS orderlist, od_client AS client WHERE orderlist.client_id = client.client_id AND orderlist.order_deleted = #{has_delete} ${sql} ORDER BY orderlist.urgent DESC

SELECT info.id, info.odd, info.company as company, info.rec_name AS rec_name, info.rec_tel AS rec_tel, info.address AS address, info.rec_address AS rec_address, info.remark AS remark, info.status AS order_status, info.create_date AS create_date FROM order_payment AS payment, order_info AS info WHERE info.id = payment.order_id ${sql}

SELECT info.id, info.odd, info.company AS company, info.rec_name AS rec_name, info.rec_tel AS rec_tel, info.address AS address, info.rec_address AS rec_address, info.remark AS remark, info.status AS order_status, payment.status AS payment_status, info.delete_type AS delete_type, info.create_date FROM order_payment AS payment, order_info AS info WHERE info.id = payment.order_id AND info.has_delete = #{has_delete} ${sql}
